mapper.select: SELECT *, ( SELECT SUM(submission_judge_score) FROM voj_contest_submissions cs NATURAL JOIN voj_submissions WHERE uid = cc.contestant_uid AND submission_id = cs.submission_id AND cs.contest_id = cc.contest_id ) AS contestant_score, ( SELECT SUM(submission_used_time) FROM voj_contest_submissions cs NATURAL JOIN voj_submissions WHERE uid = cc.contestant_uid AND submission_id = cs.submission_id AND cs.contest_id = cc.contest_id ) AS contestant_time FROM voj_contest_contestants cc WHERE contest_id = #{contestId} ORDER BY contestant_score DESC, contestant_time LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT *, ( SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(uid)) FROM voj_contest_submissions cs NATURAL JOIN voj_submissions WHERE uid = cc.contestant_uid AND submission_judge_result = 'AC' AND submission_id = cs.submission_id AND cs.contest_id = cc.contest_id ) AS contestant_score, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM voj_contest_submissions cs NATURAL JOIN voj_submissions WHERE uid = cc.contestant_uid AND submission_judge_result != 'AC' AND submission_id = cs.submission_id AND cs.contest_id = cc.contest_id AND problem_id IN ( SELECT problem_id FROM voj_contest_submissions cs NATURAL JOIN voj_submissions WHERE uid = cc.contestant_uid AND submission_judge_result = 'AC' AND submission_id = cs.submission_id AND cs.contest_id = cc.contest_id ) ) AS contestant_time FROM voj_contest_contestants cc WHERE contest_id = #{contestId} LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
